title: Beachfront Sri Lanka Escape with Daily Breakfast, Daily Lunch/Dinner & Daily Drinks
description:
Immerse yourself in the sun-kissed splendour of Radisson Blu Resort Galle, an exquisite five-star sanctuary nestled on the southwestern coastline of Sri Lanka, within the historic, UNESCO World Heritage-listed city of Galle. Surrender to the gentle lull of the Indian Ocean breeze as you bask in the tropical luxury of this beachfront haven, only a 2.5-hour drive from Colombo. Dive into the shimmering azure pool, engage in beachside games, or unwind with a revitalising spa treatment. Each of the 172 meticulously designed rooms and suites offer a private balcony or terrace, presenting breathtaking sea views for an idyllic tropical escape. 

Indulge in a gastronomic journey at the four on-site restaurants, offering a tantalising array of global and Asian-inspired cuisine, and toast to the good life at the rooftop bar. Explore the rich colonial history of Galle, with its many historic sites such as the Galle Dutch Fort and the Galle National Museum, all within a 10-minute drive. For the thrill-seekers, embark on a whale-watching expedition at Mirissa, an hour's drive away, for an unforgettable adventure.
offer_address: 523 C Colombo Road, Gintota, Galle 80280, Sri Lanka

title: Sri Lanka South Coast Five-Star Galle Escape with Daily Breakfast, Drinks & Lunch or Dinner
description:
A cocoon of tropical luxury upon a hillock gazing over the vast Indian Ocean, Jetwing Lighthouse is an architectural marvel, created by famous architect Geoffery Bawa, that offers an unforgettable taste of five-star luxury. Located in the historic city of Galle, the property is well connected - the coastal trunk road runs outside the heritage abode, offering easy access from other destinations, including Colombo via the Southern Expressway.

The tropical paradise offers 80 luxury rooms, artistically designed for a unique coastal experience, with all the modern-day amenities needed for a comfortable stay. Ayurvedic spa services will give you a holistic makeover and the tennis court will keep you active throughout your stay. If you’re looking for further relaxation, lounge by one of the two swimming pools while the little ones splash in the kids' pool before taking advantage of the fine-dining options and world-class hospitality that make up this wonderful Galle escape.

title: Boutique Sri Lanka Five-Star Tea Estate Retreat Near Galle with Daily Dining & Koggala Lake Boat Ride
description:
Discover the spirit of Sri Lanka with a five-star escape to the boutique Kahanda Kanda Galle, a retreat boasting a privileged hilltop position above boundless emerald tea fields, peacock-filled gardens and the vast jungle hinterland. Located just a 30-minute drive from the UNESCO World Heritage-listed city of Galle - renowned for its romantic, old-world ambience and mighty Dutch fortress - this hidden gem boasts just 12 bespoke villas and suites, offering guests a uniquely secluded luxury experience.

After days spent exploring Galle’s historic sights, return to mouth-watering seafood fusion at the Dining Pavilion or laze by the hotel’s magnificent infinity pool, stretching endlessly toward the coconut palm forest and the brilliant blue waters of Koggala Lake beyond.
offer_address: Habaraduwa Dikkumbura Road, Angulugaha 80122, Sri Lanka
